title: Online Translators
content:
[Google Translate](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017000545/http:/translate.google.com/): English, Albanian, Arabic, Bulgarian, Catalan, Chinese, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Estonian, Filipino, Finnish, French, Galician, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Latvian, Lithuanian, Maltese, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese. Coming soon more languages such as Armenian, Aramaic, Icelandic, Macedonian, Mongolian, Syriac and Welsh in other date.  
 [Internet Tolken](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017000545/http:/internettolken.se/): English, Swedish, German, **Norwegian** , **Danish** , **Icelandic** , **Finnish** , French, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Dutch, **Russian** , **Hungarian**. Coming soon: Greek.  
InterTran: Arabic, Chinese, Dutch, French, German, Greek, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish. More languages available.
author: 386sky
